titleStmt.title: Geography anatomiz'd, or, The compleat geographical grammar being a short and exact analysis of the whole body of modern geography after a new and curious method / collected from the best authors and illustrated with divers maps by Pat. Gordon ...
titleStmt.author: Gordon, Patrick, fl. 1700.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition much improv'd and enlarg'd.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Morden and Thomas Cockerill ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
